languages.text: "Ваши цвета поблекли, почтенный магос. Скрепите сердце — в вас достаточно сил, чтобы пережить и эту утрату".
"Your colours have faded, esteemed Magos. Steel your heart — you have enough strength in you to survive this loss as well."
languages.original_text: "Ваши цвета поблекли, почтенный магос. Скрепите сердце — в вас достаточно сил, чтобы пережить и эту утрату".

traits.locale_text: "Your colours have faded, esteemed Magos. Steel your heart — you have enough strength in you to survive this loss as well."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Your colours have faded, esteemed Magos. Steel your heart — you have enough strength in you to survive this loss as well."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Your colours have faded, esteemed Magos. Steel your heart — you have enough strength in you to survive this loss as well."

traits.locale_text: "Your colours have faded, esteemed Magos. Steel your heart — you have enough strength in you to survive this loss as well."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “你的色彩正在消退，尊敬的贤者。坚强起来吧，你依然有足够的力量，撑过这次惨重的损失。”
languages.original_text: "Your colours have faded, esteemed Magos. Steel your heart — you have enough strength in you to survive this loss as well."

traits.locale_text: “你的色彩正在消退，尊敬的贤者。坚强起来吧，你依然有足够的力量，撑过这次惨重的损失。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Vos couleurs se ternissent, honorable magos. Ne vous laissez pas dépérir. Vous avez en vous la force de survivre à cette terrible perte. »
languages.original_text: "Your colours have faded, esteemed Magos. Steel your heart — you have enough strength in you to survive this loss as well."

traits.locale_text: « Vos couleurs se ternissent, honorable magos. Ne vous laissez pas dépérir. Vous avez en vous la force de survivre à cette terrible perte. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Sus colores se difuminan, estimado Magos. Refuerce su corazón: tiene el valor suficiente para sobrevivir también a esta pérdida».
languages.original_text: "Your colours have faded, esteemed Magos. Steel your heart — you have enough strength in you to survive this loss as well."

traits.locale_text: «Sus colores se difuminan, estimado Magos. Refuerce su corazón: tiene el valor suficiente para sobrevivir también a esta pérdida».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「あなたの色が弱まっています、偉大なマゴス。情を鋼で覆うのです…この喪失感に耐えうるだけの強さを、十分にお持ちではないですか」
languages.original_text: "Your colours have faded, esteemed Magos. Steel your heart — you have enough strength in you to survive this loss as well."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの色が弱まっています、偉大なマゴス。情を鋼で覆うのです…この喪失感に耐えうるだけの強さを、十分にお持ちではないですか」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Eure Farben sind verblasst, verehrter Magos. Stählt Euer Herz — Ihr habt genügend Kraft in Euch, um auch diesen Verlust zu überleben."
languages.original_text: "Your colours have faded, esteemed Magos. Steel your heart — you have enough strength in you to survive this loss as well."

traits.locale_text: "Eure Farben sind verblasst, verehrter Magos. Stählt Euer Herz — Ihr habt genügend Kraft in Euch, um auch diesen Verlust zu überleben."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Your colours have faded, esteemed Magos. Steel your heart — you have enough strength in you to survive this loss as well."

languages.text: "Renklerin solmuş sevgili Magos. Kaybını kalbine gömmeyi bilmelisin. Bundan da sağ çıkacak güce sahipsin."
languages.original_text: "Your colours have faded, esteemed Magos. Steel your heart — you have enough strength in you to survive this loss as well."

traits.locale_text: "Renklerin solmuş sevgili Magos. Kalbine gömmeyi bilmelisin. Bu kayıptan da sağ çıkacak güce sahipsin."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
